    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Gibanje elektrine v medsebojno pravokotnim električnim in magnetnim poljem</string>
            <string language="en">Motion in electric and magnetic fields mutually perpendicular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung in elektrischem und in magnetischem 
fängt gegenseitig Senkrecht auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement dans les champs électriques et 
magnétiques mutuellement perpendiculaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento nos campos elétricos e magnéticos 
mutuamente perpendiculares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento nei campi elettrici e magnetici 
reciprocamente perpendicolari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνηση στα ηλεκτρικά και μαγνητικά πεδία αμοιβαία 
κάθετα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento en los campos eléctricos y 
magnéticos mutuamente perpendiculares</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gibanje električnega naboja v električnem in magnetnem polju, ki sta med seboj pravokotna.</string>
            <string language="en">Motion of charged particle through electric and magnetic field that are mutually perpendicular.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung des belasteten Partikels durch 
elektrische und magnetisches fangen auf, die gegenseitig 
senkrecht sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de particule chargée par le champ 
électrique et magnétique qui sont mutuellement perpendiculaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento da partícula carregada através do 
campo elétrico e magnético que é mutuamente perpendicular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento della particella caricata attraverso il
campo elettrico e magnetico che è reciprocamente perpendicolare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνηση του χρεωμένου μορίου μέσω του ηλεκτρικού και 
μαγνητικού πεδίου που είναι αμοιβαία κάθετο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de la partícula cargada a través del
campo eléctrico y magnético que es mutuamente perpendicular.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'électricité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elettricità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική δαπάνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
